dcterms:description: A freely accessible critical care database containing de-identified health data associated with over 40,000 patients who stayed in critical care units.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-III

dcterms:description: A subset of the MIMIC-III dataset that includes only the top-50 most frequent ICD-9 codes, designed for explainable prediction of medical codes from clinical text.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-III-50

dcterms:description: A cleaned version of the MIMIC-III dataset that addresses issues with previous splits, ensuring a complete representation of all classes.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-III-clean
